text: Earle Leonard Wells (27 October 1933 â€“ 1 October 2021) was a New Zealand Olympic gold medalist. He competed in yachting. Wells won the Flying Dutchman class at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo. Wells was born in Auckland. He died on 1 October 2021, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for New Zealand Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Earle Wells
